posts.post_content: actually, I really like this card for giving specifically 3 black mana. I run in my {B}{W} deck whose kill card is {B}{B}{B}. It's dificult to actually get to {B}{B}{B} in multicolor, but this helps. Obviously I also run Dark Ritual, but I don't always draw it. Having 4 of these allows me to almost always draw something akin to Dark Ritual.

posts.post_content:
Very well designed card.  
  
Early game, it is a 1 mana ramp, helping combo decks work that much faster. Later in the game when you have threshold (very easy for a UB deck post-sideboard), the card is so explosive its still useful and doesn't feel like a dead draw.
